reviews.review_text:
Never written a review this soon. Literally had one bite. OMG. Delicious. Family run restaurant with amazing food.  Lucky was so attentive making suggestions we didn't know we needed. So glad we came here! Don't think twice just goooo. We got the Seafood platter bursting with flavours. Covered in breadcrumbs - perfect because I was craving crispy food :)
Definitely coming back for more!

Visited this restaurant with friends as we were staying in Gama hotel.  This restaurant serves very tasty and delicious veg and non veg dishes.  We had lunch and dinner at this place and I had vegetarian food here.  All the vegetarian food items were delicious and reasonably priced.  The veg fried rice was awesome and the traditional Goan veg thali was superb.  You get alcoholic drinks too and the owners serve the patrons with a smile.  Service is great but is a little delayed.

Fresh fish thali and really good butter chicken. A very affordable and pocket friendly place for fish lovers.

Homely feel
